mean_en: a device for reducing or increasing the voltage of an electric power supply, usually to allow a particular piece of electrical equipment to be used
sentence: These transformers help to send electricity across the grid.
sentence_trans: 这些变压器把电传输到整个电网中。
word_etyma: trans转变 + form形状 + er表人/物 → 变压器，转换器，变形金刚
